Class HTMLConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • life.qbic.projectbrowser.helpers.HTMLConverter

    public class HTMLConverter
extends Object
implements com.vaadin.data.util.converter.Converter<String,String>
    Converts normal newlines to html newlines as used in html components. can be extended to convert different html tags
    Author:
    Andreas Friedrich
